author: Unity
description:
In this official course updated to Unity 6, you will learn to design and develop your own Virtual Reality (VR) applications. You will be guided through creating your own unique VR project from start to finish, beginning with a blank design document and ending with a fully functional project! 

Check out the course on Unity Learn: https://on.unity.com/LearnVR
title: Create with VR update for Unity 6

author: Unity
description:
The Project Auditor, a Unity 6.1 package, is an analysis tool that can help you optimize performance and identify issues. It scans projects and reports inefficiencies like heavy scripting calls, unused assets, and excessive entity counts.

Learn more in our documentation: https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.project-auditor@1.0/manual/index.html

Find more free Unity learn resources:
https://learn.unity.com/

#gamedev #unitytips #unity3d #unitylearn
title: Unity Tip Tuesday: Audit your project with the Project Auditor
